data <- read.csv("./linear-regression/multiple/data/insurance.csv")

cor(data[])

dt = sort(sample(nrow(data), nrow(data)*.8))
train<-data[dt,]
test<-data[-dt,]

model = lm(charges~age + smoker + bmi, data = train)
summary(model)
prediction <- predict(model, newdata = test)

par(mfrow=c(1,2))
plot(test$charges)
plot(prediction)
